entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High zero.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Rain showers or drizzle beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
